alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia; Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Volusia; Mainland Northern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Orange; Seminole (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 1:56PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Seminole, northern Brevard, east central Orange and Volusia Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 155 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northeast of Pierson to 7 miles northeast of DeLand Airport to near Maytown to Christmas. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Deltona, Daytona Beach, Port Orange, Titusville, Ormond Beach, DeLand, New Smyrna Beach, Edgewater, South Daytona, Holly Hill, Wedgefield, Lake Helen, Oak Hill, Pierson, Christmas, Mims, Ormond-By-the-Sea, Barberville, Haulover Canal and DeLeon Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
